content: these mitts whip up very quickly and the small amount of yarn needed makes them the perfect stashbuster project the smaller mitts are worked using size us3 and us6 needle dpns or magic loop with a gauge of about 6 sts per inch using the larger needles and measured across stockinette the larger mitts are worked using size us3 and us7 needles dpns or magic loop with a gauge of about 5 5 sts per inch using the larger needles and measured across stockinette pick any 3 colors you like just making sure you have about 20 yards of each which should be more than enough
